response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds significant importance to me. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $14,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that you will find the product to be well worth the investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
